title: Name the Test
question_text: Five situations ready for significance testing are presented. Assume all people are randomly selected. Which one describes a potential $t$-test for slope?

choices.text:
A pollster asks
30
men and
30
women whether they plan to vote for a certain candidate.

A pollster asks
60
people how many times they voted in the past and how old they are.

A pollster asks
60
people their race, their political party, and their religion.

A pollster asks
60
people how many times they have voted in the past.

A pollster asks
30
men and
30
women how many years of school they attended.
